channel.title: Change the order?
channel.description:
On the right click menu, I have trade, then stats, then walk here. How would I change stats at the bottom, becuase when someone walks somewhere, or is at a drop party, they always trade with me, making things harder. (Trades with everyone, and cant get the item)
Please Help?

item.title: Change the order?
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

On the right click menu, I have trade, then stats, then walk here. How would I change stats at the bottom, becuase when someone walks somewhere, or is at a drop party, they always trade with me, making things harder. (Trades with everyone, and cant get the item)
